Dogs flying could lead to a new era of aerial photography and videography, as they could capture unique perspectives and angles that humans could not.
Dogs flying could also be used for search and rescue missions, as they can navigate through difficult terrain and locate missing individuals or animals.
Dogs flying could revolutionize the way we train and rehabilitate dogs, as they could be used to simulate real-life scenarios and help dogs learn to adapt to different environments.
Dogs flying could also be used for transportation, as they could carry small packages or cargo through the air.
Dogs flying could lead to a new form of entertainment, as they could perform tricks and stunts in the air, similar to what we see with acrobatic dogs on the ground.
